title: How can I order a product from merch store if my country is not on the list?
body: Im from Slovenia and Riot cant shipp the product because Slovenia is not on the list. What can I do?

replies.body:
Well there's 2 of us... I want Mechs vs Minions and I can't get it...


PRAVICE ZA SLOVENCE!!!

Mal sm late sm se tut mal zanimu za to pa nic najdu in edino kar mi ostane je v Avstrijo alpa nemcijo familiji poslat pa pol sm...krnekk. Presenecen sm da lij slovenc to pisu hahhahahah

PRAVICE ZA SLOVENCE!!! {{summoner:11}}

If we're not able to ship to your country, the safest option may be to have it shipped to a friend and then have them ship it to you. You may want to research what customs laws are in place for both countries, so you'll be prepared for any delays or additional fees that may be due.

I can't guarantee this will be cost effective or easy, but it's the best solution I can think of at the moment. Let me know if you have any questions!
